selected_skills.name: extract_ages_from_image
selected_skills.purpose: Extract ages of two people from the image text.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the image hash to extract the ages of person 1 and person 2.

selected_skills.name: calc_numeric
selected_skills.purpose: Compute the age gap by subtracting the age of person 2 from the age of person 1.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the expression 'age1 - age2' to calculate the age gap.

selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.purpose: Format the final answer as a single line string.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the calculated age gap to format the answer as 'Answer: ...'.
